<h3 id="X38029">X(38029) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(3), X(6)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(3*a^5-(b+c)*a^4-2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a^3-2*b*c*(b+c)*a^2-(b^4+c^4-2*b*c*(-3*b*c+c^2+b^2))*a+(b^4-c^4)*(b-c))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38029) = X(1)+2*X(182) = X(3)+2*X(1386) = X(6)+2*X(1385) = X(40)-4*X(5092) = 4*X(140)-X(3416) = X(355)-4*X(3589) = 2*X(551)+X(11179) = 4*X(575)-X(3751) = 2*X(576)+7*X(30389) = 2*X(597)+X(3655) = X(944)+5*X(3618) = 4*X(1125)-X(1352) = 3*X(14561)-2*X(38146) = 3*X(38023)-X(38035) = 3*X(38023)-2*X(38040) = 3*X(38047)-2*X(38165) = 3*X(38049)-X(38146) = 3*X(38064)-X(38116) = 3*X(38064)-2*X(38118) = 3*X(38110)-X(38165)</b>
<p>X(38029) lies on these lines: {1,182}, {3,1386}, {6,1385}, {30,38023}, {40,5092}, {140,3416}, {165,17508}, {355,3589}, {511,3576}, {515,14561}, {516,38115}, {517,5085}, {518,5050}, {519,38064}, {524,3653}, {542,25055}, {551,11179}, {572,16972}, {575,3751}, {576,30389}, {597,3655}, {611,1319}, {613,2646}, {614,37527}, {944,3618}, {952,38047}, {971,38048}, {997,17976}, {1125,1352}, {1350,13624}, {1469,37618}, {1482,12017}, {1503,5886}, {1571,5116}, {1572,1691}, {1699,29012}, {2836,32609}, {3056,3612}, {3098,7987}, {3242,15178}, {3526,3844}, {3564,38028}, {3616,6776}, {3624,24206}, {3679,10168}, {3745,16434}, {3818,8227}, {3827,10202}, {4265,32612}, {4297,31670}, {5054,28538}, {5096,32613}, {5102,31662}, {5138,18443}, {5480,18481}, {5603,25406}, {5691,19130}, {5731,14853}, {5762,38046}, {5840,38050}, {5845,38030}, {5846,26446}, {5847,10165}, {5848,38032}, {5849,38033}, {7290,31394}, {7968,19145}, {7969,19146}, {7982,20190}, {9778,33750}, {9955,36990}, {9970,11709}, {10267,36741}, {10269,36740}, {10516,11230}, {10541,24680}, {11579,11720}, {11645,38021}, {11699,16010}, {11710,12177}, {12261,32233}, {12329,16202}, {12407,20301}, {13373,24476}, {16203,22769}, {17502,31884}, {18583,34773}, {19140,33535}, {28186,38136}, {28204,38144}, {28208,38072}</p>
<p>
X(38029) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3576, 16475}, {5050, 10246}, {5603, 25406}, {5731, 14853}<br>
X(38029) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (165, 17508), (10516, 11230), (14561, 38049), (31884, 17502), (38035, 38040), (38047, 38110), (38116, 38118), (38144, 38167)<br>
X(38029) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38023, 38035, 38040), (38064, 38116, 38118), (38119, 38120, 38110)<br>
</p>
